data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Implements similar functionality as Locale::Maketext, except that
    instead of providing _the programmer with the tools_ to localise a
    string, Locale::MakePhrase _provides tools to a linguist_ which
    allows the linguist to create rules that are applicable to the
    language of a string from one language into nother language.
